mapper.select: SELECT RID , CREATE_BY , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_BY , MODIFY_DATE , FLAG , JOB_NAME , JOB_DESC , STATUS , CRON_EXP , CRON_EXP_DESC , RUN_RESULT , JOB_CLASS_FULL_PATH FROM JOB_MST WHERE 1=1 AND FLAG = '1'

SELECT RID , CREATE_BY , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_BY , MODIFY_DATE , FLAG , JOB_NAME , JOB_DESC , STATUS , CRON_EXP , CRON_EXP_DESC , RUN_RESULT , JOB_CLASS_FULL_PATH FROM JOB_MST WHERE 1=1 AND FLAG = '1' AND RID = #{jobRid}
